prompts: Create an adorable electric-type Pokemon with a shiny blue coat and sparkling yellow accents.
I want a small Pokemon that looks like a playful feline with star-shaped features.

Design a Pokemon with a fluffy, blue body and bright yellow eyes that radiate joy.
